message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10000 to you personally. Considering its high quality and unique features, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that could potentially save you thousands while enhancing your experience. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice.
